title: Status Update
description: After being uprooted by his parents' separation and unable to fit into his new hometown, a teenager stumbles upon a magical app that causes his social media updates to come true.

reviews.text: Honestly I only watched this because the plot sounded so ridiculous and stupid. I got it right. If the main character was at any point in the film not a complete idiot or completely self centered everything thats a problem in the plot could have been resolved by the end of the first act.

Lonnie makes one funny joke and after that, I'm still watching this cringey, unfunny and weird "comedy" movie. Also, there is some poor and cringey dialogue from the main protagonist throughout this movie and how the **** did I survive the 1 hour and 46 minutes of hell, holy ****
